description:
This exceptionally "easy to understand" course is designed for those who want to understand the basics of football, but have not found a source to explain it to them in a simplified way. After taking this course you will be able to:

  • Follow what's going on either on your screen or at the stadium much easier
  • Enjoy the game to a much greater extent
  • Share football experiences with others who enjoy the game as well
  • Offer impressive insights, ideas and opinions on either a specific game or the game in general
  • Add more fun to your life
  • Multiple PDF downloads to view later
  • Downloadable instructions
  • Free "after course" support for additional learning
  • Fun "Find the mistake quiz" at the end

Have the freedom to watch this amazing course from any device such as tablet, smart phone, computer etc. Enjoy =)
title: Football Simplified
